text: Robert Swan Mueller III (; born August 7, 1944) is an American lawyer and civil servant. He was the sixth Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from 2001 to 2013. He is a Republican. He was appointed by President George W. Bush and his original ten-year term was given a two-year extension by President Barack Obama. Mueller is the longest-serving FBI director since J. Edgar Hoover. He is currently head of the Special Counsel investigation of Russian interference in the 2016 United States elections. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at the Federal Bureau of Investigation and staff * * * * *Robert Mueller Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Directors of the Federal Bureau of Investigation Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert Mueller
